author: USA TODAY, Jessica Flores, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: Donald Trump hints at second stimulus check; US deaths near 11K; Wisconsin faces election amid stay-at-home order
description: While federal health officials have warned Americans of a grim week ahead, there are "positive signs" emerging in coronavirus hot spots.
content:
There is a lot of misinformation out there about coronavirus. We sort the facts from falsehoods.
Wochit
President Donald Trump hinted at a second round of stimulus checks on Monday, hours after the U.S. coronavirus death toll topped 10,000  more than six Am… [+8892 chars]
